issue.title: [CI] Free up space on github actions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8524](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8524). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We run into out of space errors in multiple builds. Github actions ship with a lot of preinstalled software which are essentially not required to run the docker-compose based builds, so try to clean up some space.
